Name: Pink Khaleesi
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: MUDDLE peppercorns in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Pretty in pink but with a hint of spice and the distinctive Greek flavour of mastiha.
